咸爺Radio都幾嬲下,
真係想開鳩平治班人波

https://www.thisisf1.com/2018/07/01/hamiltons-angry-radio-exchange-with-merc-strategist-in-austrian-gp/


1、Hamilton: “Anything I should be aware of?”
我應該注意些什麼麼？
Bonnington: “Nothing at the moment. Let’s just target Verstappen’s lap times.”
目前沒有，我們以VER的圈速做對標
Bonnington: “VSC, Keep the delta positive.”
虛擬安全車，保持現有距離

2、Bonnington: “OK Lewis it will be box at the end of this lap if we are still under VSC conditions.”Lewis如果這圈結束VSC還在，我們會進站
Hamilton: “Were we supposed to box that lap?”
我們是不是應該上一圈進？
Bonnington: “Negative, we weren’t. We were just waiting to see what everyone else did.”
不，不應該，我們只需要等著看其他人做什麼
Bonnington: “So VSC ending.”
VSC結束
Bonnington: “So staying out.”
那麼留在外面

3、Hamilton: “What the hell was that? How did we miss that? I’ve got no tyre left.”
這TM什麼情況？我們怎麼可能錯過那個（窗口）？我沒有輪胎了

4、Hamilton: “I’ve got no tyre left, these tyres.”
我沒有輪胎了
Vowles: “Lewis, It’s James. I understand. We’re still with you mate. It’s my mistake. But give us what you can. There will be opportunities later.”
Lewis這裡是James我們依然和你一起，這是我的錯，請向我們展示你能做的，之後會有機會
Hamilton: “I can hear you guys.”


5、Hamilton: “Am I fourth now?”
我現在是不是第四？
Bonnington: “Affirm Lewis, yeah. Entirely on us that problem.”
是的，嗯，這完全是我們的錯

6、Hamilton: “I wanted to say something but…”
我想說點什麼但是……

7、Hamilton: “Just leave me to it, Bono.”
讓我專注賽道吧Bono

8、Bonnington: “OK Lewis go HPP 5 position 2.”
Hamilton: “Hesitation out of turn nine.”
9號彎出彎很掙扎
Bonnington: “Copy.”
明白

9、Hamilton: “I need this pack to f***ing charge up.”
我需要這些來充電

10、Bonnington: “OK Lewis we are up at the rear limit on tyre temps.”
Lewis我們現在已經到了後胎胎溫的極限了
Bonnington: “We have seen signs of rear blistering on tyres ahead.”
我們可以看到明顯的後胎剝離的情況
Hamilton: “So you just want me to settle for fourth, yeah?”
也就是說你們就是想讓我守在第四對吧？
Bonnington: “Affirm.”
是

Bonnington appears to have misheard him, and then corrects that his reply:
（Bonnington似乎是聽錯了Ham的意思，然後重新更正）
Bonnington: “Sorry, just want to settle in place until they recover.”
不是，我們只是想讓你守住位置直到事情好轉
Bonnington: “Looks like Ricciardo has big blistering. You should be able to see it from where you are.”
看起來里卡多剝離也很重，在你的位置上應該能看到的

11、Hamilton: “I’m not going to be able to pass these guys. We’ve just thrown away a win.”
我不可能超過他們了，我們把勝利拱手讓人了

12、Hamilton: “So I back off and now look what’s happening.”
所以我稍微放慢節奏然後看看會發生什麼
Vowles: “Lewis it’s James. I have thrown the win away today but you have the potential opportunity to get back up. Just let the tyres cool. We trust in you and believe in you. I’m sorry.”
Lewis我們確實丟了勝利，但是我們還有機會彌補，讓輪胎冷卻，我們相信你，信任你，抱歉
Hamilton: “I’ve got Vettel now on my tail.”
Vettel已經追上我了

13、Vettel then passes Hamilton.
Vettel超越
Hamilton: “Well, there you go.”
好吧，讓你過去
Hamilton: “I’ve got blistering too.”
我也開始剝離了
Hamilton: ”These tyres aren’t going to last at this pace.”
這個節奏下輪胎根本撐不住

14、Hamilton: “My rear tyre is de-laminating more and more.”
後胎剝離的越來越嚴重了
Bonnington: “OK copy.”
明白

15、Hamilton: “Is Ricciardo catching us?”
里卡多在追近嗎？
Bonnington: “Ricciardo 8.7 last lap he is hitting a bit of traffic.”
里卡多這一圈1:08.7，他會碰到交通問題
Bonnington: “Ricciardo 1.4 inside our pit window.”
里卡多在我們的進站窗口1。4s以內

16、Hamilton: “I don’t know what to say to you guys. These rears are not going to bloody last.”
我不知道對你們說些什麼，這些後胎根本TMD撐不住
Bonnington: “OK, we’re on it.”
OK我們在觀察

17、Bonnington: “Lewis 12 laps to go, Vettel is 22 seconds up the road, we need to think about consolidating.”
Lewis還有12圈，Vet領先22s，我們需要考慮穩定性了
Hamilton: “So we turn down?”
所以我們放棄？
Bonnington: “Affirm, that’s my suggestion.”
是的，我們建議這樣

18、Hamilton: “How many points am I going to lose?”
所以這樣的話我會丟多少分？
Bonnington: “At current pace it will be three points.”
目前的話是3分

19、Hamilton: “I’ve lost power.”
Bonnington: “Stop, stop.”

VSC結束

那麼留在外面

3、Hamilton: “What the hell was that? How did we miss that? I’ve got no tyre left.”
這TM什麼情況？我們怎麼可能錯過那個（窗口）？我沒有輪胎了

4、Hamilton: “I’ve got no tyre left, these tyres.”
我沒有輪胎了
Vowles: “Lewis, It’s James. I understand. We’re still with you mate. It’s my mistake. But give us what you can. There will be opportunities later.”
Lewis這裡是James我們依然和你一起，這是我的錯，請向我們展示你能做的，之後會有機會
Hamilton: “I can hear you guys.”


5、Hamilton: “Am I fourth now?”
我現在是不是第四？
Bonnington: “Affirm Lewis, yeah. Entirely on us that problem.”
是的，嗯，這完全是我們的錯

6、Hamilton: “I wanted to say something but…”
我想說點什麼但是……

7、Hamilton: “Just leave me to it, Bono.”
讓我專注賽道吧Bono

8、Bonnington: “OK Lewis go HPP 5 position 2.”
Hamilton: “Hesitation out of turn nine.”
9號彎出彎很掙扎
Bonnington: “Copy.”
明白

9、Hamilton: “I need this pack to f***ing charge up.”
我需要這些來充電

10、Bonnington: “OK Lewis we are up at the rear limit on tyre temps.”
Lewis我們現在已經到了後胎胎溫的極限了
Bonnington: “We have seen signs of rear blistering on tyres ahead.”
我們可以看到明顯的後胎剝離的情況
Hamilton: “So you just want me to settle for fourth, yeah?”
也就是說你們就是想讓我守在第四對吧？
Bonnington: “Affirm.”
是

Bonnington appears to have misheard him, and then corrects that his reply:
（Bonnington似乎是聽錯了Ham的意思，然後重新更正）
Bonnington: “Sorry, just want to settle in place until they recover.”
不是，我們只是想讓你守住位置直到事情好轉
Bonnington: “Looks like Ricciardo has big blistering. You should be able to see it from where you are.”
看起來里卡多剝離也很重，在你的位置上應該能看到的

11、Hamilton: “I’m not going to be able to pass these guys. We’ve just thrown away a win.”
我不可能超過他們了，我們把勝利拱手讓人了

12、Hamilton: “So I back off and now look what’s happening.”
所以我稍微放慢節奏然後看看會發生什麼
Vowles: “Lewis it’s James. I have thrown the win away today but you have the potential opportunity to get back up. Just let the tyres cool. We trust in you and believe in you. I’m sorry.”
Lewis我們確實丟了勝利，但是我們還有機會彌補，讓輪胎冷卻，我們相信你，信任你，抱歉
Hamilton: “I’ve got Vettel now on my tail.”
Vettel已經追上我了

13、Vettel then passes Hamilton.
Vettel超越
Hamilton: “Well, there you go.”
好吧，讓你過去
Hamilton: “I’ve got blistering too.”
我也開始剝離了
Hamilton: ”These tyres aren’t going to last at this pace.”
這個節奏下輪胎根本撐不住

14、Hamilton: “My rear tyre is de-laminating more and more.”
後胎剝離的越來越嚴重了
Bonnington: “OK copy.”
明白

15、Hamilton: “Is Ricciardo catching us?”
里卡多在追近嗎？
Bonnington: “Ricciardo 8.7 last lap he is hitting a bit of traffic.”
里卡多這一圈1:08.7，他會碰到交通問題
Bonnington: “Ricciardo 1.4 inside our pit window.”
里卡多在我們的進站窗口1。4s以內

16、Hamilton: “I don’t know what to say to you guys. These rears are not going to bloody last.”
我不知道對你們說些什麼，這些後胎根本TMD撐不住
Bonnington: “OK, we’re on it.”
OK我們在觀察

17、Bonnington: “Lewis 12 laps to go, Vettel is 22 seconds up the road, we need to think about consolidating.”
Lewis還有12圈，Vet領先22s，我們需要考慮穩定性了
Hamilton: “So we turn down?”
所以我們放棄？
Bonnington: “Affirm, that’s my suggestion.”
是的，我們建議這樣

18、Hamilton: “How many points am I going to lose?”
所以這樣的話我會丟多少分？
Bonnington: “At current pace it will be three points.”
目前的話是3分

19、Hamilton: “I’ve lost power.”
Bonnington: “Stop, stop.”

replies.msg:
認真答案
因為Blistering 唔係正常既車胎損耗
正常條胎係經過表層加熱-表層溶化 > 內一層加熱-溶化
咁樣慢慢損耗

而 Blistering 產生既原因係車胎表層加熱, 但溶化唔曬

但我唔同意換特供胎, 依家10隊有4隊完全冇事
其中拉利係因為星期五遇到Blistering, 改左setup先冇事
而且有Blistering 咪pit 囉, 初期既Blistering 又唔會即刻爆既
解決Blistering 係車隊自身既責任
